name: GLOBAL FINANCIAL INTEGRITY
sampleDescriptions: Beneficial ownership proposals, discussion drafts, rules, and legislation, including the Corporate Transparency Act (H.R.3089, S. 1717 (115th)), the True Incorporation Transparency for Law Enforcement
